overview: "Vicarious" is gorgeous performer/director Bobbi Starr's foray into all-girl porn, with an intimacy that's "so close you can taste it!" The director's POV camera takes the viewer into the thick of the action, where lesbian lust hangs like a fragrant mist. Bobbi introduces each of her nine co-stars with revealing, honest interviews that segue into sensuous, private sex. This is the real thing!
title: Vicarious
